problem.markdown:
>>Fill in the blank with one word: In general, an increase in affluence results in a(n) _________ in environmental degradation.<< = increase or= Increase or= greater or= more or= added
[explanation] More affluence could both increase and decrease environmental degradation. However, in general, an increase in affluence usually results in an increase in environmental degradation. For example, affluence can promote more consumption and greater environmental degradation. Although in some cases, more affluence can allow someone to purchase more energy efficient lightbulbs. [explanation]
